alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 6:40PM CST until January 03 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Chilton, Shelby and Talladega. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 640 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alabaster, Sylacauga, Calera, Montevallo, Childersburg, Columbiana, Jemison, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Vincent, Harpersville, Wilton, Bon Air, Shelby County Airport, American Village, Lay Lake, University Of Montevallo, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Fayetteville and Ashby.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
